------------------------------ AVG VALIDATION LANDSCAPE -------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

***************************************************************************************
CRITERION: MIN VAL MSE --> 1.024e-01 (1e-01) 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 METRIC || Train            ::   Val            ::   Test           ::  Interp 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 MAPE   || 1.7     (0.5)    :: 2.5     (0.6)    :: 2.6     (0.8)    :: 15.5     (2.4)    
 R2     || 0.99136 (8e-03)  :: 0.98374 (1e-02)  :: 0.98048 (3e-02)  :: 0.99083 (3e-03)
